[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

See your OSRS kc for a monster/boss.

**Usage**

- `/kc rsn:<string> boss:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `rsn` | `string` | Yes | The RuneScape username to check | - |
| `boss` | `string` | Yes | The boss you want to check | - |

**Examples**

- `/kc name:General Graardor`
